description: Armed with his amazing new super powers, Alex is more than ready to introduce the world to LAZERMAN...but he may soon discover that being a hero might not be as easy as it looked in his comic books. With the villain responsible for the accident that created him still on the loose, Lazerman might have to get the hang of the hero business, and fast...after all, no one ever said being a hero would be easy.
name: Lazerman Issue Two

description: Finding himself face to face with a real live super powered villain, Lazerman knows he is in for the fight of his life... If he's going to make it out of this mess and stop this vile villain, he must learn that there is more to being a hero than just having super powers! It's a super powered clash of hero and villain you do not want to miss!
name: Lazerman: Showdown!

description: This is IT! With a diabolical plan for revenge set into motion, Lazerman has one last chance to prove to himself and the world that he CAN be a hero... with the fate of a national monument hanging in the balance! Will he succeed, or will the face of New York City be changed forever??? Don't miss the exciting conclusion of "THIS MAN, THIS LAZER!"

With Lazerman’s two week absence to recover from his battle with Razorman, the public has begun to wonder if the entire event was a hoax. Now rested and recovered, Lazerman is ready to make his triumphant return, only to suddenly find New York under attack from a legion a Zombies! Is he strong enough to battle a legion of the undead? The "Night of the Necrolord" has begun!
name: Lazerman: Night of the Necrolord!

description: The Golden Age Lives Again! The Huntsman takes the spotlight in this fourth issue of Liberty Comics, with the thrilling conclusion to his epic struggle with the mysterious ANTHEM. Also in this issue, DARK MALICE stars in the classic adventure, "A Touch of Malice," by Dennis Mallonee and Benton Jew.
The She-Bat is hearing voices, and they're not the usual ones. A mysterious trio of witches is slowly unraveling our heroine's abilities, shaking the very essence of her character.
name: Sirens In the Night; Kings For A Demon Chapter 2

description:
Marvel's most terrifying monsters star in four tales of harrowing horror!

Jack Russell, the Werewolf by Night stalks a killer werewolf in the mountains while searching for a cure that will end his curse. The mal-formed Man-Thing, temporarily in possession of his mind, attempts to save a man from certain death at the hands of racist hunters. And Son of Satan battles a possessed child killer along with the murderous voices in his head...

Story Titles

  • Man-Thing - Descent of the Beast
  • Son of Satan - Silence
  • Werewolf By Night - The Cure
  • The Living Mummy - The Heist
name: Descent of the Beast; Silence; The Cure; The Heist

description: "Wild Curves" is a pin-up art sketch comic book featuring illustrations by artist George Sportelli.
name: Wild Curves #1

description:
The ten-issue vampire epic on the bayou from the writer of the A Song of Ice and Fire novels continues in issue seven!

From the New York Times Best-selling author, George R. R. Martin, comes a tale of vampire clans, death and debauchery, legendary blood masters, and even a few epic steamboat races on the muddy Mississippi. This is Martin's FEVRE DREAM, an antebellum story of power, loss, and the fever of bloodlust.

After a disastrous dinner with Damon Julian, there may be no hope left for York. But Abner Marsh doesn't have time to worry about his friend and business partner, because he's too busy running for his life from a coven of cruel vampires and one psychotic sour Billy. And the sun has set over the Mississippi river, so nowhere is safe...

Each issue of this stunning full-color epic is illustrated by Rafa Lopez, an artist whose skilled line captures every moonlit drop of blood in delicious detail. Adapted by the Hugo-nominated author Daniel Abraham, this version of FEVRE DREAM stays faithful to Martin's original dark vision, while bringing the torture and joy of his vampires to almost-human life. This haunting series is available with Regular and Wraparound painted covers by Felipe Massafera.

Mature Themes

volume.name: George R. R. Martin's Fevre Dream

description: Secretary. Bodyguard. Assassin. The Executive Assistant is all of the above rolled into one. Enter EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT: IRIS! The final issue of Aspen's newest action adventure series, EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT: IRIS, sees the walls of her existence come crashing down upon her as Iris' bloody trail of deception and murder lead her on a path, and showdown with one man-Mr. Ching! Atop the soaring skyline of Dubai, Iris is forced to rely on all of her life experiences up to this point, including those less favorable to her memory, to defeat the wrath of her contemptuous former employer as well as the deadly surprise Ching has in store for his now-former Executive Assistant! From the creative minds of David Wohl and Michael Turner, EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT: IRIS delivers the thrills unlike anything you've ever seen!
name: End of the Innocence

description:
Turok, wandering warrior from a far land, rescues Andar, son of a Chiricahua chief, from the ruthless King Maxtla and his Aztec horde. Pursued into a vast cavern, prey and predators are swept away by an unimaginable force to a savage, timeless land of nightmares and miracles, where dinosaurs thunder and rampage. Beset by bloodthirsty enemies and beasts, Turok and Andar encounter an even deadlier threat-the fearsome Panther People and their mesmerizing goddess, Aasta...

Turok, Son of Stone returns, reimagined by legendary writer Jim Shooter and illustrated by hot new talent Eduardo Francisco ( Victory, Executive Assistant: IRIS).
 
Includes a reprint from Turok Son Of Stone (#1) published by Dell Comics in December 1954 (Four Color #596).
name: Aztlan Part 1: Out of Time; Turok, Son of Stone and The World Below

description: "Xilch: The Galactic Game" is a 24 page Full Color Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: Xilch: The Galactic Game

description: "Dinoman: Groin-Smashing 1st Issue!" is a 24 page Black and White Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: Dinoman: Groin-Smashing 1st Issue!

description: "Dinoman Issue #2" is a 20 page Black and White Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: Dinoman Issue #2

description: "Z-Girl and the 4 Tigers" is a 44 page Full Color Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: Z-Girl and the 4 Tigers

description: An influx of new students at Riverdale High has the whole school bouncing off the walls with more pretty girls, ace athletes and a mysterious jokester able to go prank-to-prank with Reggie. Can Archie and the gang keep out of trouble and keep the new kids from turning the whole school upside down?
name: New Kids Off The Wall, Part 1

description: The original adventures of the She-Devil with a Sword continues! Writer Peter Brett is back to the basics with a story open and accessible for all readers! Featuring the art of Walter Geovanni!
name: War Season, Part 2: Grim Tidings

description: An original graphic novel from Warren Ellis and his Apparat line of books! A highly trained but under equipped army invades another country due to that country’s perceived threat to home security. The army conducts shock-and-awe raids designed to terrify the populace. This army is soon driven to ground, and vastly outnumbered. The English army has to stand and fight, in Crecy, France. On 26 August 1346, modern warfare changed forever. This is the story of England’s greatest battle. Featuring the stunningly detailed art of Raulo Caceres.
name: One Shot

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 236 released on October, 1983.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 236 released on December, 1996.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 236 released on July, 2009.
name: Il Cerchio di Sangue

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 237 released on November, 1983.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 237 released on January, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 237 released on July, 2009.
name: Contro Tutti

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 238 released on December, 1983.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 238 released on January, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 238 released on August, 2009.
name: Mercanti di Morte

description:
The original warrior of Mars returns from Dynamite!

Warlord of Mars, an enhancement of the classic Edgar Rice Burroughs story, Princess of Mars! If you thought you knew the story, think again! This series will capture the grit and action of the original while expanding on it with new elements. The story is about John Carter, an ex-cavalry officer in the Confederate Army who finds himself mysteriously transported to Mars! Joining him in his adventures there are Tars Tarkas, his Martian comrade, and Dejah Thoris, a Martin Princess.

This series is written by Arvid Nelson and is illustrated by Stephen (Avengers/Invaders) Sadowski and Lui Antonio, and features covers by Alex Ross, Joe Jusko, J. Scott Campbell and Lucio Parrillo...
name: A Tale of Two Planets, Part 1

description: Ever since she got a claw of her own, Kitty Pryde's been feeling ...not herself. To put it mildly. And after barely surviving an encounter with the Marauders' secret weapon, the young X-Man feels a strange, inexplicable pull towards the land of the rising sun. Of course, it can't be a coincidence that said secret weapon is also stalking the streets of Tokyo, right? A It's gonna take more than just one claw for Kitty to make it through round two!
name: Blood Debt !

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description: Curse of the Mutants,' part 4. With thousands of vampires poised to attack Utopia, just waiting for the word from their leader, Xarus, the X-Men's best hope for survival just might lie in a most unlikely new ally: the newly resurrected Dracula, who has more than a bone to pick with his traitorous son.Â But the problem cuts even deeper: The X-Men have lost one of their greatest warriors, fallen victim to a vampire bite. A Brace yourself for Vampire Wolverine!
name: Curse of the Mutants, Part 4

description:
flip of http://www.comicvine.com/femforce-138-gargantarama-2-flip-book/4000-129282/

If you think the first blockbuster issue was great, wait'll you see THIS one!! More scintillating giant women in action behind this issue's spectacular Silvano cover than you can get anywhere else in comicdom!! This issue opens with out title star, GARGANTA herself, drawn into a tense, real-life crime scenario with thousands of lives in the balance. She must use her size-changing & crimefighting skills in new and innovative ways in order to stop a crisis at the biggest NASCAR event of the year, in "Off To The Races!!", written & drawn by Mark G. Heike, with ink finishes by Jeff Austin. Then, two of the most-requested GTS plots ever by FEMFORCE fans happen this issue: Actress & one-time giantess Marla Allison returns in "Attack Of The 5' 6" Woman", plotted & drawn by Eric Theriault, inked & dialogued by Mark G. Heike. A burglar gets (dare we say it) a big surprise , as we learn that Marla is looking for (dare we say it) big things from a new direction. Then- it's the worst nightmare imaginable for the FEMFORCE when STELLA STARGAZE attains giant size in "Terror On A Tear"; written by Xizor and drawn by Silvano. If you like super economy-sized sexy and glamorous women in stories of action & excitement, this is the book for you. And remember, GARGANTARAMA THE COMIC BOOK is a flip-book- once you finish reading GTCB, just turn it over, flip past Ken Hunt's flip cover illustration, and you have FEMFORCE #138- one big comic book made up of two great features baxck-to-back. FEMFORCE #138 features ALL-NEW, NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN STORIES FROM COVER TO COVER!!! Another action-packed issue starring the longest-running female super-team in history!! Start off with that rambunctious RAD, who returns to bedevil her mother, FF head honcho MS. VICTORY in "My Own Worst Enemy". A revenge-seeking madman engineers a battle royale between the two distaff titans that may costs BOTH of their lives- and what might it's conclusion portend? Written by Chris Irving, with art by Gianluca Cerrutelli and Jeff Austin. Then, picking up the thread of last issue's mysterious events, NIGHTVEIL suddenly finds herself at the gravesite of The HAUNTED HORSEMAN, confronted by a new enemy- The BLUE BULLETEER!?! "Shadowhunt" is written by Chris Irving, with art by Ken Hunt (who also drew this issue's stellar front cover) & inks by Mark Heike. Then, TARA FREMONT gets back to her jungle roots in a sequel to a story that appeared in FF #128, as she gets the upper hand on a band of murderous poachers in "Silence Falls on Jungle Island", written by Enrico Teodorani, and drawn by Antonio Conversano. And although we know (based on last issue's events) that SHE-CAT has disappeared, she's in action here in a short feature from another time & place titled "It Was Just Another Night", also written by Enrico Teodorani, with art by Drew Gardner...
name: FemForce #138 (flip book)

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 239 released on January, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 239 released on February, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 239 released on August, 2009.
name: A Carte Scoperte

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 240 released on February, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 240 released on February, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 240 released on September, 2009.
name: Ombre del Passato

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 241 released on March, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 241 released on March, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 241 released on September, 2009.
name: Ore Disperate

description:
flip of http://www.comicvine.com/femforce-139-trashed/4000-123914/

A new giantess comes onto the scene in "Carry A Big Torch", a giant-woman heroine with a new twist. Created, written and drawn by Chad Halcom, with ink finishes by Jeff Austin, we're sure she's going to be a big hit- SO sure that a sequel story is already being prepared for next issue!! Then, another GTS premiere, as the team of Enrico Teodorani and Antonio Conversano introduce an urban giantess crimefighter, La Vedoya. Finally, Femforce star "Too Tall TARA" takes center stage in "Natural Habitat", as corporate hitmen leave her for dead in an overgrown wilderness, but the big, bold and bombastic jungle brunette tracks down her assailants and brings them to justice in a BIG way in the end!! Written by Steve Orlando, with art by Larry Guidry and Mark Heike. All this plus pinups by Heike- one, an Old West gunfightin' giantess- and the other, Big 'Uns star Queen Drusilla!! As always, Gargantarama - The Comic Book is produced in flip-book format, sharing an issue of Femforce- this one being FF #139. So, flip the book upside down, turn to the opposite cover and start flipping!! Femforce #139 opens with an all-out action tale starring MS. VICTORY, who must take on not one, not two, but three supervillainesses (Valkyra, Alexandria the Greatest & Prom Queen) in "What You Can't See Can Kill You"!! Written by Paul Monsky, with art by Ed Coutts. Then, NIGHTVEIL must stop a homicidal psychotic killer in an untitled story written by Enrico Teodorani, with art by new sensation Ken Hunt. Next, MS. VICTORY is back for a return engagement when she must face off against a sorceress who is evil incarnate in "One Against Evil", written by Teodorani, with art by Antonio Conversano.

Femforce #139 and Gargantarama #3 are actually all one book, produced in a flip-book format, with the Femforce #139 cover on one side, and Gargantarama #3 on the other...
name: FemForce #139 (flip book)

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 242 released on April, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 242 released on March, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 242 released on October, 2009.
name: I Quattro Evasi

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 243 released on May, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 243 released on April, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 243 released on October, 2009.
name: Il Segno di Cruzado

description: The Story: The companion volume to the X-Men event of 2010! Fighting for the future of mutantkind, the X-Men are locked in battle with Bastion. When Magik is gravely injured in battle, she instinctively flees to the sanctuary of Limbo - only to fall into the clutches of a longtime adversary hoping to wrest the powerful Soulsword - and control of Limbo - from her grasp. Now, a small team of X-Men venture in after her, but they are met only by unexpected peril. And in X-Factor, the mutant hunter Bastion has sent the Mutant Response Division and Bolivar Trask after X-Factor with one mission: Kill them all. And it seems thus far that all is going according to plan. Collecting CABLE: HOPE, X-MEN: SECOND COMING REVELATIONS: BLIND SCIENCE, X-MEN: SECOND COMING REVELATIONS: HELLBOUND #1-3 and X-FACTOR #204-206.
name: HC

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 244 released on June, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 244 released on April, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 244 released on November, 2009.
name: I Cacciatori e la Preda

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 245 released on July, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 245 released on May, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 245 released on November, 2009.
name: Sentiero Senza Ritorno

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 246 released on August, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 246 released on May, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 246 released on December, 2009.
name: Il Figlio di Cochise

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 247 released on September, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 247 released on June, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 247 released on December, 2009.
name: Sfida nel Canyon

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 248 released on October, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 248 released on June, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 248 released on January, 2010.
name: Il Marchio di Satana

description:
flip of http://www.comicvine.com/femforce-140-nothing-to-fear-but-fear-itself/4000-170645/

More fun and frivolity starring the giant-sized ladies; this issue with a strong FEMFORCE slant, as the MS. VICTORY, SHE-CAT and NIGHTVEIL must try to deal with an insidious plot by the villainous DARKFIRE as she attempts to manipulate the economy-sized GARAGANTA herself for evil purposes in "Bedtime For Garganta". Written by Bill Black, with 3D digital art by cover artist Uroboros. Guest-starring CAPTAIN FREEDOM .Then, a weight-reducing formula called No Biggie goes haywire with surprising GTS ramifications in "Side Effects May Vary", written and drawn by Stephanie Sanderson-Heike, with inks by Mark Heike, and finally a sequel to last issues' classic "Carry A Big Torch", as Dr. Henry Lewis and the oversized Betty Blake are back; chased by the military, but ready to fight back, 'till the FF steps in!! Check out the GTS catfight between Betty and The FEMFORCE' S own giant girl, "TOO TALL" TARA!! Story and art by Chad Halcom, with inks by Mark Heike. And, as per usual, flip the book over, and get more great glamorous super-heroine action as the opposing side of the flip-book is the historic 140th issue of FEMFORCE, the all-girl team of costumed crimefighters!! All the divergent plotlines touched on over the last 15 issues come to a head as a group of super-powered antagonists (including a member of the FF gone bad) under the control of a power-mad alien threat from decades past have lured The FEMFORCE to a secluded spot for a final showdown. This issue's lead story is the first half of writer Chris Irving's opus, "Nothing To Fear But Fear Itself". See the FF (with General Roberta Strock in tow) in pitched battle in a prehistoric jungle!! See Nightveil lose her mystical abilities, and returned to the non-powered status of The BLUE BULLETEER!! See MS. VICTORY meet a shocking new "family member"!! See SHE-CAT fight with the bad guys!! Witness the supreme villainy the twisted demi-god, STARDUST THE SUPER-WIZARD!! Guest- starring MR. MOD and The SCARAB. Scripted by Chris Irving, with art by Larry Guidry, Guillermo Sanna, Jeff Austin and Rob Landsley. Then, the art team of Guidry and Austin returns on an Enrico Teodorani- written back-up set in the early days of World War II. Founding FFer RIO RITA fights Fascism on her own while undercover in a tiny Mexican town in "Dark Angel"...
name: FemForce #140 (flip book)

description:
"Tex Tre Stelle" nr. 249 released on November, 1984.
"Tutto Tex" nr. 249 released on July, 1997.
"Tex Nuova Ristampa" nr. 249 released on January, 2010.
name: Furia Infernale

description:
The haunting began last Halloween, but this year, Matt Sturges, Peter Milligan, Mike Carey, Jill Thompson and a hoary host of guest creators deliver even more spine-tingling thrills in the HOUSE OF MYSTERY HALLOWEEN ANNUAL #2! The annual House of Mystery Halloween Party is in full swing when the doorbell rings, which is unusual because a) it's never happened before and b) there isn't a doorbell at the House of Mystery! What does Fig find when she opens the door? A warped trio of kids cursed to trick or treat until the end of time who will spin a tale spanning the years involving many Vertigo favorites such as Hellblazer, Lucifer, Madame Xanadu, iZombie and loads of others!

Story Titles

  • Untitled House of Mystery Story
  • Untitled Madame Xanadu Story
  • John Constantine in Bonfire Night
  • Devil's Lake an I, Zombie Story
  • Infernal Bargains Just Say No!
name: Bonfire Night; Devil's Lake; Infernal Bargains Just Say No!

description: "Raye Knight: Spellbound" is a 24 page Black and White Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: Raye Knight: Spellbound

description: "The Silver Bullet" is a 16 page Black and White Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: The Silver Bullet

description: Don't miss this stand-alone, 5-issue miniseries from writer Si Spencer and red-hot artist Sean Murphy (JOE THE BARBARIAN) shipping twice in October! When John Constantine is run over by a truck, it takes a little while for England's nicotine-fueled magus to realize that he's perched between life and death. After a few weeks of hospital rehab, Constantine find the London streets VERY different from when he left them behind as a series of occult murders and mutilations demands his attention. The common denominator points back to the ER where Constantine was admitted…
name: Chapter 1: Accidents Will Happen

description: Blessed by the gods, for better or for worse, and driven by rage and sadness, Erik cuts a massive swath through the Christian-dominated Northlands. He seeks nothing less than a total cultural purging, and it seems like his one-man jihad will succeed…
name: Metal: The Death Black

description:
After breaking with her mission to save a young girl, Agent finds herself perused by the local factions.

"Native Drums" is a 28 page Full Color Standard Sized comic Book.

Long Walk

A lone Agent, her remote support known as Controller, and a young girl she has rescued, are moving through eastern Africa towards the town of Goma.
name: Long Walk

description: Two luchadores, Rey Diablo and Ave de Fuego, are sent to wrestle a match in a small, Southern California town. Unbeknownst to them, their destination is in actuality, an abandoned prison town overrun by zombies, flying saucers and a beautiful but deadly, Space Queen!
name: Los Luchadores Mysteriosos Issue #1

description:
Kerri Masters is retired and living a normal life, working a mundane job and taking care of her son Daniel, seemingly at home with her decision to retire. Then, a mysterious woman approaches her with a job offer and throws her entire world into question. Was she right to retire five years ago? If she comes back, will it ever be the same as it was before?

Five years after the tragic end of Fallen Justice we find Kerri Masters struggling in more ways than one with the events of the past. She has retired, and seemingly moved on from her former life as one of the most powerful heroes in the world. But when she meets a mysterious woman who offers her the chance to return to her glory days as the costumed heroine Dynagirl, she must finally come face to face with the ghosts that seem to haunt her wherever she goes.

Denise Mina, award-winning crime novelist, brings her psychological style of crime fiction to Vertigo Crime. Meet the Ushers. The parents, Ted and Biddy. Grandma Martha. The three kids, William, Amy and Sam. Just a normal, middle-class family gathered around the table on Christmas Day. Until they start dying. Violent deaths. One by one. Is there a curse on their house, as a recently unearthed history of witchcraft in the area would suggest? Or has one member of the Usher clan declared open season on the rest? As secrets and resentments boil to the surface, it becomes clear that more than one Usher has a motive for killing off the others. But in the end, the truth turns out to be far more shocking than anyone in this ill-fated family could have imagined.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter One: Merry Fucking Christmas
  • Chapter Two: Slice the Heart Out
  • Chapter Three: The Center Cannot Hold
  • Chapter Four: The Death of Innocence
  • Chapter Five: The Night of the Hunter
name: HC

description: Don't miss this tale of power plays and double-bluffs that takes readers into the inner council of Tom's enemies. Uncover their dark past and violent present. Wilson Taylor is dead, but how did the 14th book get hijacked? Why is Tom still alive? And whose head is going to roll for it?
name: Mix

description: After several big breaks in the case, the spree killer's name is revealed and he's finally within Detective Curt Delatte's grasp. With the massive storm inching closer every hour, he may already be too late...
name: 3 of 5

description: "Ghost Zero: Escape From the Vigilante Crypt" is a 28 page Black and White Standard Sized Comic Book.
name: Ghost Zero: Escape From the Vigilante Crypt

volume.name: Ghost Zero: Escape From the Vigilante Crypt

description:
"Ghost Zero: Ghosts With Guns!" is a 32 page Black and White Standard Sized Comic Book.     
 
This comic book features two stories, "Sea of the Dead", and "The Fleshless Legion."
name: Ghost Zero: Ghosts With Guns!

description: Meet April Fewells, comic burlesque queen! You may have already seen her on deviantART or Heromorph, and now you can see her in her very first comic. Watch April indulge in sexy slapstick fun as anything from an incompetent rogue space alien to a fumbling, bumbling cat burglar. Other sketches, such as April as an evil queen bantering with her magic mirror, add to the striptease nature of her act. Over 5 different sketches, vignettes, and blackouts; 28 plus pages in all. Total PG fanboy (and fan girl) fare.
name: April's Le Tout Burlesque

description: Weirder, wilder, and more whacked-out than the first, April Fewells returns for more farcical fun in her second comic as Cleoslapstick, the Queen of Ancient Gags (Cheops thrills, anyone?). Other sketches include April as a sexy vampiress spooked in her own haunted house, and reprises characters such as the spaced-out space queen and incompetent cat bungler--er--burglar. Over 5 different and totally brand-new sketches, vignettes and blackouts. 28 pages of PG fanboy (and fan girl) fare in full color, with a foreword by Biohaz Daddy.
name: April's Le Tout Burlesque Issue #2

description:
Gunbreed: Ghost Town Ressurected is a supernatural western about a Sheriff who witnesses the death of his son and the people of his town at the hands of a criminal gang that practices black magic. Powder Cain comes back from the dead to get his revenge.

Standard Comic

Full Color

Page Count: 24
name: Gunbreed: Ghost Town Ressurected

description: By Steven "Noppie" Knopenberger; from the creator of Crystal Balls comes this luscious tale of big-breasted bi-chicks in outer space, staging hot, sweaty orgies against a starry backdrop -- all drawn with Noppie's lush art style, meticulous attention to detail and moment-by-moment storytelling techniques!

Abe hunts a horrific monster preying on small-town populations and leaving their corpses in massive sinkholes, while Kate clashes with the UN, and Johann abandons his post for a giant body in a vat...
name: 3 of 5

first_appearance_teams.name: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense

team_credits.name: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense

volume.name: B.P.R.D.: Hell on Earth - New World

description:
Jed Whedon and Maurissa Tancharoen, joined by longtime Buffy the Vampire Slayer artist Cliff Richards, take us on an intricate trip through the precise moment when the Active technology went global, and how the protagonists from Epitaph One and Two narrowly avoided death, and worse. Jed Whedon and Maurissa Tancharoen wrote the Epitaph episodes of Dollhouse Seasons One and Two, and currently write for the Starz series Spartacus. This is their first work in comics. Artist Cliff Richards has drawn more Joss Whedon-related comics than any other artist, including issues of Buffy Season Eight.

This is a limited edition Dollhouse comic book by Dark Horse Comics, which came with the season 2 DVD and Blu-ray, released on October 12th. This One-Shot was released again on March 30, 2011, with 15 pages of additional content.
name: Epitaphs

description:
BRIGHTEST DAY continues as Adara, the Hope Entity, finds a host in a young girl who may be destined to be a great savior. Can this young student hope to contain such a powerful force – and what will drive Hal Jordan on a spiritual journey unlike any he's ever taken? 

Plus, the Spectre sets his sights on the Rage Entity
name: Hope Burns Bright
Night of the Devil; Pamela of the Jungle; The Call of the Flesh; Apocalypse Tomorrow; Blood Bound; Tenebra

description: At the feet of the milespires of the utopian megalopolis North Am, in the shadowy regions where the dregs of humanity dwell, Magnus invades the stronghold of the "Metal Mob"--human criminals who use robot muscle to plunder and terrorize the city. Big Guns, the cyborg mob enforcer, along with scores of brutal thug--robs and assassins, stands between Magnus and the "Pens," where kidnap victims await ransom, auctioning into off--world slavery, or being sold by weight as a protein source to the Arcturians. Leeja Clane and the stunningly beautiful Cinnette, both kidnap victims, are prime material for the chattel trade. In a lawless land, Magnus fights against an army of ruthless killers to save the Metal Mob's prisoners, especially the woman he is quickly falling in love with...
name: Metal Mob, Part Two: Deliverance

description:
The new Green Hornet faces his greatest challenge as the deadly Black Hornet engages him in a high-octane duel to the death on the streets of Century City.
As The Black Hornet strikes at the very heart of the Hornet's Nest, even the aid of the Kato family may not be enough to keep the legacy of The Green Hornet intact, or Britt Reid alive. Only on the verge of their own destruction do Green Hornet and Kato realize that Century City itself faces an equally disastrous fate...
name: Episode 8: The Sting

description: Grant Morrison is joined by all-star artist Ryan Sook in the penultimate issue of THE RETURN OF BRUCE WAYNE! In this story, Bruce Wayne finds himself in the hard-boiled streets of Gotham City's past. Will his adventure as a private investigator help him take one step closer to the present day?
name: Masquerade

description:
In the future, Chicago is a city that runs on secrets and lies. These cons and half-truths make life difficult for Detective Joe Shek, doing his best day by day to sift through the corruption and uncover what little truth remains. But Shek has secrets of his own...
Shek and Luke continue their journey to becoming Chicago's only hope! THE GREEN HORNET STRIKES!

description: BRUCE WAYNE – THE ROAD HOME kicks off here as Dick Grayson and Damian Wayne rush to quash a damaging news item that could threaten the secret identities of the entire Bat-family! And as if that weren't enough to occupy their time, their father figure, Bruce Wayne, has returned…
name: Outside Looking In

volume.name: Bruce Wayne: The Road Home: Batman and Robin

description:
What happens when teenagers mess with zombies? Teenagers get dead.

What happens when zombies mess with a VFW? Zombies get f%@king dead!
name: ZFW:  Zombies of Foreign Wars

description: Master detective Tim Drake takes center stage in this one-shot as the one person who continued to have faith that Bruce Wayne was alive. But now that Tim's belief is proven accurate, how will that affect the important changes about to bombard the life of Red Robin?
name: The Insider
